* Iron Raptor watches Plintissa walk out of the room but then turns her 
attention back to the book in front of her.
There was a trick to this book and she think that she knew it...*

" Lights off."

* The lights turn off and suddenly the pages of the book glow green, words 
appear on the pages and Iron Raptor sits down at the desk and begins to 
read. There was so much to learn and so little time!*
